welcome_message_body: Welcome to Erd, Hungary! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this historic city, known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Erd has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 2A
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights and is the largest terminal at Liszt Ferenc International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly low-cost airlines and is connected to Terminal 2A by a pedestrian walkway.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and regional flights and is the oldest terminal at Liszt Ferenc International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by providing their email address.
